doc.title: Hives
doc.plot: Remember the Bee-hive hairdo craze of the sixties, who could forget it? Not the countless millions who sported the incredible do, nor the evil Earth invading aliens living inside! That's right, the Bee-hive hairdo was no coincidence and neither is its return to quite North Ridgeville, Ohio! Who will save the people of Earth from enslavement and the curse of tacky hairdos? Salvation lies in the hands of five unlikely heroes brought together by fate: Dr. Deadalus Gruedder (George Macdonald), a once famed NASA scientist now exiled by the government; Lizbeth "Delta" Jordan (Teri Drda), the CIA's top agent and femme fatale; Ace Diamond (Duane Winters) A down on his luck private detective; Ace's brother Sponge (Charles Seders) and his multi-faceted Jamaican friend (James Seward). Is the Earth's fate secure in the hands of these unwitting heroes? Or will the Evil Commander Zorgon Rule at long last. Find out in this fun-for the family HAIR RAISING ADVENTURE!
